title: Idho Idho En Pallavi Lyrics Sigaram
stanzas: <div>Idho idho En Pallavi Song Lyrics Sigaram

Idho idho en pallavi
eppodhu geetham aagumo
ivan undhan saranam endraal
appodhu vedham aagumo.

en vaanam engum pournami
idhu enna maayamo.
en kadhala un kadhala
naan kaanum kolamo.

en vazhkai ennum koappaiyil
idhu enna vaanamo.
parugaamale rushiyerudhe
idhu enna jaalamo.

pasi enbathe rusi allavaa
adhu indru theerumo..

Idho idho en pallavi
eppodhu geetham aagumo
ival undhan saranam endraal
appodhu vedham aagumo.

Andha vaanam
theerndhu pogalaam
nam vazhkai theerumaa.
paruvangal niramaralaam
nam paasam maarumaa.

oru paadal paada vandhaval
un paadal aaginen
vidhi maaralaam
un paadalil shruthi
maara koodumaa

Idho idho en pallavi
eppodhu geetham aagumo
ival undhan saranam endraal
appodhu vedham aagumo.
